thread.title: Ford chases rivals in China with a ramp-up in Lincoln cars

title: Ford chases rivals in China with a ramp-up in Lincoln cars
text:
Ford chases rivals in China with a ramp-up in Lincoln cars 11:02am IST - 01:32 
Ford's premium Lincoln brand plans to build as many as five new vehicles in China by 2022, according to two U.S. sources, in a move to expand sales in the world's largest vehicle market that would also blunt the impact of trade U.S-China trade spats. Ed Giles
